work.name: Kwalee
work.summary: The company behind Draw it, Teacher Simulator, Airport Security, Bake it and many more fun games.
work.description: Kwalee is the company behind Draw it, Teacher Simulator, Airport Security, Bake it and many more fun games. They believe in making the most fun games for the world.

roles.name: Frontend Developer II
highlights: Built Kwalee's internal UI design system from scratch to power an ad-mediation platform and other frontend apps.
Integrated authentication flow and RBAC end to end across Almada.
Worked on various features to make the Almada B2B ready.

roles.name: Frontend Developer II
highlights: Worked on multiple features to support admin dashboard for Dream Build Solitaire and other games.
Optimized code structure to make an admin dashboard support multiple games.
Implemented ABAC across the apps to support access control across teams/environments.

work.name: JTG
work.summary: JTG provides advanced and customized technological solutions for its clients to overcome business challenges.
work.description: JTG provides advanced and customized technological solutions to companies with a focus on overcoming business challenges.

roles.name: Senior Frontend Developer
highlights: Led multiple cross-functional teams for medium to high complexity features in React, Firebase, Python, GCP architecture for a car park management platform.
Designed, reviewed & implemented technical implementation design and plans for features like Azure AD SSO, integrating payment gateways etc.
Onboarded & mentored new developers, conducted interviews.

roles.name: Frontend Developer
highlights: Supported the device management team to implement a multi-step form with google maps integration.
Facilitated multi-timezone support for UI timestamps across the platform for accurate datetime.
Designed interview problems for campus/off-campus recruitment drives.

roles.name: Frontend Developer
highlights: Developed several modules for pod.ai mobile app based on ionic, angularjs for students along with a react/redux based web app.
Designed interview problems for campus/off-campus recruitment drives.

work.name: InstantPost
work.summary: InstantPost builds the next-generation consumer electronics.
work.description: InstantPost builds the next-generation consumer electronics ecosystem for smart home and small business infrastructure. I got a great opportunity to work on number of projects in my early days in tech.

roles.name: Software Engineer
highlights: Wrote frontend SDK for paper printing infrastructure. Integrated this with two of the InstantPost's core web applications.
Developed and integrated InstantPost's authorization server with several microservices.
Maintained and supported features for multiple microservices in Python and Flask.
Wrote Embedded C for LattePanda platform to control payments, temperature regulators for printing infrastructure.

creations.name: Almada
creations.summary: An ad mediation platform for game studios and independent game developers.
creations.description: Almada is an Ad Mediation platform for game studios, businesses to optimize and manage ad-networks in one place with just one SDK integration.

projects.name: Ad Mediation Platform
highlights: Developed and delivered high fidelity UI revamp for the app from a MVP-stage UI, resulting in a new brand image for user acquisitions.
Integrated AWS Cognito for Google SSO with app-level RBAC for authorization.
Designed & implemented data import/export features in various modules for ease of administration over the platform, reducing administrative time by 40% with intuitive UI.
Optimized performance issues across the app, resulting in better UX and overall app performance.

creations.name: Design System
creations.description: Kwalee's internal design system powers many projects from game developer onboarding platform to Kwalee's very new main website (not out yet).

projects.name: UI Design System
highlights: Laid the foundations with a monorepo(turborepo) consisting packages like react components, centralized tailwind-config, linter(biome) configs etc.
Integrated this system in two projects enhancing developer efficiency and reducing designer/developer workload by 60-70%.
Wrote dev scripts to propagate local changes over all host apps from local dependencies using chokidar and concurrently.

projects.name: Infrastructure
highlights: Implemented build scripts in Node.js for automatic react component generation for SVGs from hundreds of SVG files.
Established automated deployment and npm release using AWS Amplify and Bitbucket pipelines

projects.name: Documentation
highlights: Documented the technical design and usage guidelines for the design system as well for ease of integration with future applications.
Developed storybook app for easy component navigation and documentations.

creations.name: Games Tools
creations.summary: Set of internal tools to support Kwalee's portfolio of casual mobile games.
creations.description: Set of Internal tools to support Kwalee's portfolio of casual mobile games.

projects.name: Data Migrator
projects.summary: A data management tool to view difference between game entities across environments and migrate them.
projects.description: A data management tool to view difference between game entities across environments and to migrate them based on business decisions.
highlights: Implemented a JSON diff viewer with customized algorithm for dynamic schema with nested arrays and objects.
Added the ability to view the outcome of merging the data objects.
Architected attribute based access control across the app with polymorphic re-usable react components

projects.name: Games Dashboard Core
projects.description: Stripped off casual games admin dashboard's core components into a central library to support multiple games.
highlights: Isolated casual games admin dashboard's core pages, services, components using Vite's library mode.
Separated elements as building blocks with composition and inheritance patterns.
Supported multiple games dashboard with their game specific parameters with this lib as a base for them.
Documented the technical implementation and its usage guidelines.

projects.name: Games Admin Dashboard
projects.description: This was Kwalee's casual games dashboard, primarily used for Dream Build Solitaire game.
highlights: Developed a custom Calendar component to view game events' timelines for data-analysis.
Optimized data set tables with list virtualization.
Integrated drag and drop ability within the above-mentioned virtualized tables for row re-ordering.
Worked on a number of features to support addition of generic levels, announcements for the game.

creations.name: NexusPlatform
creations.summary: GroupNexus owned car park management platform supporting over 1,200 parking sites all over UK.
creations.description: GroupNexus owned platform owned car park management platform supporting over 1,200 parking sites all over UK. It offers an end-to-end service, from technology that monitors and analyzes parking data, to setting the standard for the provision of management services. .

projects.name: Platform
highlights: Integrated Stripe's BACS direct debit for ease of payments propelling revenue with good numbers, Â£500k+ and still climbing
Architected, planned and led end-to-end Azure AD SSO integration with google cloud platform.
Implemented scalable multi-timezone support for time-critical modules to support new countries in client's portfolio.

projects.name: Enforcement Management
highlights: Implemented scalable multi-timezone support across the app for time critical modules to support new countries in client's portfolio.
Increased test coverage of various modules from âˆ¼50% to 85% with Jest & RTL (React testing library) to further increase the system's robustness.
Designed and developed a module for asynchronous bulk data processing using Python/Flask with GCP Pub/Sub architecture which reducing administration time required for manual UI updates by 40%.
Improved code structure of legacy code bases by moving common logic to reusable React components, containers, hooks, and services.
Added multi-language support in a dynamic multi step form and its template

creations.name: Calyxpod
creations.summary: An application for end-to-end recruitment management for institutes and companies.
creations.description: An application for end-to-end recruitment management for institutes and companies. I mainly worked on the students app.

projects.name: Platform
highlights: Worked with stake holders to revamp the app dashboard, post feed, forums, job opportunities, job offers page's UI/UX.
Prioritized, debugged and fixed bugs in the backlog and made the mobile app overall stable for usage.
Quickly ramped up on angularjs which was used in this project.
Worked on its react based web app as well to develop business supporting features

creations.name: Printing Infra
creations.description: At InstantPost I contributed to build two core offline first web applications and supporting backend microservices to leverage its printing kiosk infrastructure for on demand paper printing.

projects.name: Printing SDK
projects.description: This is InstantPost core frontend SDK to let frontend apps to use its printing hardware capabilities.
highlights: Used webpack to write a generic re-usable frontend SDK and integrated it into various frontend apps.
Worked on multiple microservices in an edge network infrastructure.

projects.name: GIS
projects.description: Geographic information system is a backend service which stores the geographical locations of printer nodes and provides supporting co-ordinates and OSM APIs
highlights: Used messaging queues to asynchronously communicate with other services.
Refactored distance calculating algorithm and overall codebase to use REST standards with flask RESTful

projects.name: Bootstrap.today
projects.description: Bootstrap.today is a platform for creation, signing and management of digital agreements & documents.
highlights: An offline first application leveraging service workers and background sync.
Created a intuitive interface for creation of document templates and workflows
Integrated the printing SDK to let users select printing nodes, upload documents and schedule prints.
Created MVC structured backend with express and mongo

projects.name: Snoopy
projects.description: Snoopy is a chat app where user could talk to each other, share documents and even initiate print workflows with the printing SDK.
highlights: Worked on optimizing the chat order with storing the timestamp when user actually clicked sent along with server timestamp
Integrated printing SDK to utilize printing infrastructure within the chat interface

projects.name: Auth server
projects.description: This was IP's central auth server written in php which works as an identity provider, so that all the users could login with InstantPost credentials across all the apps.
highlights: Added functionality to blacklist JWT tokens on logouts, duplicate logins etc. for enhanced security.
Designed and implemented the login/registration pages for the frontend.
Integrated this with other frontend/backend as well.

projects.name: Commando
projects.summary: Software to manage IP's printers remotely in realtime.
projects.description: Software to manage IP's printers remotely in realtime.
highlights: Wrote embedded C code to control pay and print supporting devices like coin acceptors, currency note acceptors, temperature sensors etc.
Integrated this with python backend to update the status of the devices, display the device status/data in realtime.
Refactored the repo to split the code into modules for better maintainability.
